json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.desc: Online JSON parser and formatter with syntax validation support

code-diff.name: Code Difference Checker
code-diff.desc: Compare differences between two pieces of code online with various display modes and whitespace ignore options
code-diff.no_diffs: No differences found or empty input.

code-beautifier.name: Code Beautifier
code-beautifier.desc: Code formatter and beautifier supporting multiple programming languages, can generate code screenshots
code-beautifier.formatting_not_supported: Formatting is not currently supported for this language in browser.
code-beautifier.code_too_large_for_image: Code too large for image generation
code-beautifier.image_generation_failed: Failed to generate image. The code block might be too large.
code-beautifier.formatting_not_supported_title: Formatting not supported for this language

sql-formatter.name: SQL Formatter
sql-formatter.desc: Online SQL statement formatter supporting multiple database dialects

latex-editor.name: LaTeX Editor
latex-editor.desc: Online LaTeX formula editor with real-time preview and export to multiple formats
latex-editor.render_error: LaTeX rendering error. Please check your syntax.
latex-editor.title: LaTeX Editor

base-calculator.name: Base Calculator
base-calculator.desc: Basic mathematical operations supporting multiple bases (binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal) with detailed calculation steps
base-calculator.result_negative: Result is negative. Showing steps for |A - B|.
base-calculator.step_by_step_binary_only: Step-by-step visualization is currently available for Binary (Base 2) operations only.
base-calculator.enter_valid_numbers: Enter valid numbers to see details.

bigint-calculator.name: Big Number Calculator
bigint-calculator.desc: Calculator supporting arbitrary precision integer operations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, power operations, modulo operations, and greatest common divisor and least common multiple calculations
bigint-calculator.exponent_negative: Exponent must be non-negative for BigInt
bigint-calculator.exponent_too_large: Exponent too large for browser safety limit (max 10000)

bitwise-calculator.name: Bitwise Calculator
bitwise-calculator.desc: Calculator supporting multiple bitwise operations (AND, OR, XOR, NOT, left shift, right shift, etc.) with 32-bit visualization

base-converter.name: Base Converter
base-converter.desc: Mutual conversion between common bases (binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal) and custom bases

encoding-converter.name: Encoding Converter
encoding-converter.desc: Encoding and decoding tool supporting multiple encoding formats (Base64, URL encoding, hexadecimal, binary, etc.) processed locally in the browser
encoding-converter.input_placeholder:
Enter {{mode}}...

You can "also":
• Drag & drop a file here
• Paste a file (Ctrl/Cmd + V)
• Click Upload button
encoding-converter.info_text: Supported "Encodings": Base64 (standard and URL-safe), URL encoding, Hexadecimal, and Binary. All conversions are performed locally in your browser. You can type, paste, drag & drop, or upload files.

config-converter.name: Configuration File Converter
config-converter.desc: Converter supporting mutual conversion between multiple configuration file formats including JSON, YAML, TOML, XML and INI
config-converter.parsed_content_empty: Parsed content is empty or invalid.
config-converter.toml_error: TOML Generation "Error": {{error}}. Ensure data doesn't contain nulls or mixed-type arrays.
config-converter.xml_warning: Data wrapped in <root> element to ensure valid XML.
config-converter.ini_warning: INI format does not support deep nesting. Some data structure may be flattened or lost.

curl-converter.name: cURL Converter
curl-converter.desc: Convert cURL commands to Python, JavaScript, PHP and other programming languages

uuid-generator.name: UUID Generator
uuid-generator.desc: Online generator for universally unique identifiers (UUIDs)
uuid-generator.v5_desc: Namespace + Name hashed using SHA-1 (Preferred over v3).
uuid-generator.enter_name_namespace: Enter name and namespace to generate.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.desc: Online generator for various hash functions
hash-generator.local_calculation: Calculates hash locally in your browser.
hash-generator.enter_text_or_file: Enter text or upload a file to generate hashes.

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.desc: Online decoder for JSON Web Tokens (JWT)

flag_desc.global: Find all matches instead of stopping after the first match
flag_desc.multiline: Treat ^ and $ as start/end of each line rather than the entire string
flag_desc.sticky: Match only at the position indicated by lastIndex

categories_desc.character_classes: Match sets of characters of a specific type
categories_desc.anchors: Match specific positions in the text
categories_desc.quantifiers: Specify how many characters or expressions should match
categories_desc.groups: Combine multiple tokens into a single unit

character_classes.3: Any of a, b, or c

browser-info.name: Browser Info
browser-info.desc: Online tool to display information about your browser
browser-info.description: This tool displays information exposed by your browser to websites. All data is retrieved client-side via standard Web APIs (Navigator, Screen, Window).

archive-extractor.name: Archive Extractor
archive-extractor.desc: Online tool to extract files from ZIP archives
archive-extractor.invalid_zip_error: Invalid or corrupted ZIP file. Please ensure it is a valid .zip archive (RAR and 7z are not supported).
archive-extractor.drag_drop_hint: Drag and drop or select a ZIP file to browse content and extract files.
archive-extractor.decrypt_hint: Click download to decrypt and save this file.
archive-extractor.preview_unavailable: Preview not available for this file type. You can download it to view content.
archive-extractor.select_file_to_view: Select a file to view contents
archive-extractor.select_file_preview: Select a file from the tree to preview
archive-extractor.password_prompt: The file {{filename}} is encrypted. Please enter the password to extract it.

pdf-tools.name: PDF Tools
pdf-tools.desc: Online tool to merge, edit, and extract pages from PDF files

errors.merge_min_files: Please select at least 2 PDF files to merge.
errors.merge_failed: Failed to merge PDFs. Please ensure files are not password protected or corrupted.
errors.load_failed: Failed to load PDF. File may be corrupted or password protected.

pdf-tools.no_files: Add multiple PDF files to merge into one.
pdf-tools.no_file_selected: Open a PDF file to view pages, rotate, delete or split.

video-audio-converter.name: Video/Audio Converter
video-audio-converter.description: Online tool to convert video and audio files between various formats
video-audio-converter.upload-desc: Supports MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, MP3, WAV, and more
video-audio-converter.performance-description: Faster presets result in quicker conversion but larger file sizes. Slower presets give better compression but take more time.
video-audio-converter.webcodecs-description: Use WebCodecs API for faster encoding/decoding when supported by your browser. Can significantly improve performance.
video-audio-converter.multithreading-description: Use multithreaded version of FFmpeg for faster processing on multi-core systems. May not be supported by all browsers.
video-audio-converter.multithreading-not-supported: Multithreading is not supported in your browser. Your server must send specific headers (Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: require-corp and Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin) to enable SharedArrayBuffer support.
video-audio-converter.multithreading-not-supported-warning: Multithreading is not supported in your browser. Falling back to single-threaded version.
video-audio-converter.step1: Select a video or audio file using the upload button
video-audio-converter.step4: Click "Convert" and wait for the process to complete
video-audio-converter.note-content: Your files are processed locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server.

ffmpeg.name: FFmpeg
ffmpeg.description: Online tool to run FFmpeg commands for video and audio processing

screen-test.name: Screen Test
screen-test.desc: Online tool to test your screen for dead pixels and other issues
screen-test.check_red_blue_channels: Check red and blue channel issues
screen-test.check_red_green_channels: Check red and green channel issues
screen-test.help_text: This test will help you detect dead pixels and other display issues
screen-test.guide_item1: Look for bright spots (white pixels) on a black background
screen-test.guide_item2: Look for dark spots (black pixels) on a white background
screen-test.guide_item3: Look for color-inconsistent pixels on solid color backgrounds
screen-test.guide_item4: Observe gradient areas for streaks or color bands
screen-test.guide_item5: Check grid pattern edges for sharpness
screen-test.checklist_item2: Conduct test in a dark environment
screen-test.checklist_item3: View each pure color test individually
screen-test.checklist_item5: Use gradient tests to check color transitions
screen-test.stuck_pixel_desc: Pixels fixed on a specific color
screen-test.color_uniformity_desc: Color shifts in certain screen areas
screen-test.brightness_uniformity_desc: Overly bright or dark areas on screen

camera-test.name: Camera Test
camera-test.desc: Online tool to test your camera
camera-test.access_error: Could not access camera. Please check permissions.
camera-test.permission_hint: Please allow camera access in your browser settings.

mic-test.name: Microphone Test
mic-test.desc: Online tool to test your microphone
mic-test.access_error: Could not access microphone. Please check permissions.
mic-test.record_hint: Record a short clip to test your microphone and headphones.

mouse-test.name: Mouse Test
mouse-test.desc: Online tool to test your mouse
mouse-test.instruction: Test all buttons by clicking them. Scroll up/down to test the wheel.

keyboard-test.name: Keyboard Test
keyboard-test.desc: Online tool to test your keyboard
keyboard-test.press_any_key: Press any key to start testing...
keyboard-test.instruction: Press keys on your keyboard to test them. Green indicates the key has been tested.

gamepad-test.name: Gamepad Test
gamepad-test.desc: Online tool to test your gamepad
gamepad-test.connect_hint: Connect your gamepad via USB or Bluetooth and press any button to activate it.
gamepad-test.press_button_hint: If connected but not showing, try pressing a button on the controller.
gamepad-test.circularity_hint: Rotate sticks in full circles to test circularity. Ideal is 0% error (perfect circle).

touch-test.name: Touch Test
touch-test.desc: Online tool to test your touch screen
touch-test.multi_touch_support: Supports multi-touch up to your device's limit

sensor-test.name: Sensor Test
sensor-test.desc: Online tool to test your device sensors
sensor-test.title: Device Sensors Test
sensor-test.permission_hint: Please enable device sensor access in your browser settings to use this feature.
sensor-test.hint: Click "Start Listening" to begin testing device sensors. Move your device to see orientation and acceleration data.

speaker-test.name: Speaker Test
speaker-test.desc: Online tool to test your speakers
speaker-test.stereo_desc: Click the buttons below to test Left, Right, or Both channels.

dns-lookup.name: DNS Lookup
dns-lookup.desc: Online tool to query DNS records

error.query_failed: DNS query failed. Please check the domain name.
error.no_records: No DNS records found for this domain and record type.

dns-lookup.info_text: This tool queries DNS records using DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH) from multiple "providers": Google DNS, Cloudflare, and AliDNS. All queries are performed securely over HTTPS. Common record "types": A (IPv4), AAAA (IPv6), MX (Mail), TXT (Text), CNAME (Alias), NS (Name Server).

certificate-search.name: Certificate Search
certificate-search.desc: Online tool to search for SSL/TLS certificates
certificate-search.error: Failed to fetch certificates. Please try again.
certificate-search.no_results: No certificates found for this domain

ip-lookup.name: IP Lookup
ip-lookup.desc: Online tool to lookup IP information
ip-lookup.error: Failed to fetch IP information. Please try again.

http-status.name: HTTP Status Codes
http-status.desc: Online tool to lookup HTTP status codes

ui.search_placeholder: Search by code (404), status (Not Found), or description...

dns-records-info.name: DNS Record Types
dns-records-info.desc: Online tool to lookup DNS record types
dns-records-info.title: DNS Record Types
dns-records-info.description: Detailed information about different DNS record types

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.desc: Online tool to count words, characters, lines, and paragraphs
word-counter.placeholder: Start typing or paste text to analyze...

pomodoro.name: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro.desc: Online tool to manage your time with the Pomodoro Technique

qr-barcode.name: QR & Barcode Generator
qr-barcode.desc: Generate customizable QR codes and barcodes from text or URLs

color-converter.name: Color Format Converter
color-converter.desc: Convert between different color formats including HEX, RGB, HSL, HSV and CMYK

editor.name: Image Editor
editor.desc: Edit images with various filters and settings

converter.name: Image Converter
converter.desc: Convert images to PNG, JPEG, or WEBP formats.

ico-converter.name: ICO Converter
ico-converter.desc: Convert images to ICO format for favicons and Windows applications

ico-viewer.name: ICO Viewer
ico-viewer.desc: View detailed information about ICO files including embedded images and metadata

metadata.name: Image Metadata Viewer
metadata.desc: Extract and display EXIF, IPTC and other metadata from image files
metadata.no_gps_data: No GPS data found in this image

csv-json.name: CSV & JSON
csv-json.desc: Convert between CSV and JSON formats

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum
lorem-ipsum.desc: Generate random placeholder Lorem Ipsum text

text-escaper.name: Text Escaper
text-escaper.desc: Escape and decode special characters in text
text-escaper.error_invalid_input: Error: Invalid input for selected operation

ip-subnet.name: IP Subnet Calculator
ip-subnet.desc: Calculate subnet information including network address, broadcast address and host range

unix-timestamp.name: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix-timestamp.desc: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates

user-agent.name: User Agent Parser
user-agent.desc: Parse User-Agent strings to extract browser, operating system and device information

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.desc: Generate secure passwords with customizable length and character sets

rsa-generator.name: RSA Key Generator
rsa-generator.desc: Generate RSA public and private key pairs for encryption and digital signatures

app.title: Handy front-end utilities
app.subtitle: Select a tool from the sidebar or choose one below to get started.

common.drag_drop_paste_or_click: Drag & drop, paste (Ctrl+V), or click to select a file
